column3: McKinney supports full reproductive rights for women, including safe access to comprehensive prenatal and postnatal/infant care, family planning services and contraception, including "morning after" medication, and abortion. She rejects forced, coerced, or uninformed medication and sterilization, and supports single-payer universal healthcare.
